item.description:
3rd Time Is A Charm!! And it looks like it'll be a perfect day!!

What's the plan?

We'll do an approx. 2-10 mile walk in loops through a corn maze, over bridges, under bridges, into dead ends, finding clues and at some point making our way over the final bridge to the exit.

https://www.davisfarmland.com/megamaze/index.html

Do not cheat and view it from above.

I'm thinking teams of two to four and see who can cross every bridge, solve every riddle, and get all the answers.  I've done this a few times and never got 100% done even after 4 hours.

It costs $16.95 per person.  They have free water and outhouses if you can find them. 

 

Where will we meet?

Just inside after paying.  There are picnic tables to gather at.  It opens at 10am and there will be a crowd so get there a little early.

 

What should I bring?

- Wits

- Water (24 oz - 1 Liter)

- Good hiking shoes/trail runners at times it's a bit muddy so prepare.

- Backpack with snacks

Directions:

https://www.davisfarmland.com/megamaze/directions.html
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing an orange baseball hat and an orange hooded sweatshirt
item.name: Beginner Hike:Davis Megamaze (2-10 Miles On A Warm Sunny Day!)
